overview: James is Co-founder of Fettler, Inc. Prior to Fettler, James was a Management Consultant for Capgemini and a Director of Finance for Marriott Vacation Club International. At Capgemini, James managed strategic finance transformation projects for fortune 500 companies. At Marriott, James led the finance and accounting activities and teams for several vacation club projects within Marriottâ€™s timeshare business. James began his career at PricewaterhouseCoopers and has over 10 years of finance, accounting and administrative experience.
